sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Assign a legal hold to a file, file version, folder, or user.

Inputs:

  • Policy ID - ID to identify the policy.
  • Assign To - Item to assign the policy to.

Outputs:

  • Legal Hold Policy Assignment - Returns List of Created Webhook.
    • ID
    • Type
    • Legal Hold Policy
    • Assign To
  • Status - Will be set to "Success" if the request succeeds or "Error" if a failure occurs.
  • Error Message - Will be populated when the status is "Error".

Error Messages:

  • Invalid username or password/token.
  • User with the specified login already exists.
  • Invalid input parameters in request.
  • The credentials associated with the Box Spoke connection does not have enough permission to perform this action.

To use this action, the corresponding Box connection and credential must be created and associated with the Box Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
Assign a legal hold to a file, file version, folder, or user.

Inputs:

  • Policy ID - ID to identify the policy.
  • Assign To - Item to assign the policy to.

Outputs:

  • Legal Hold Policy Assignment - Returns List of Created Webhook.
    • ID
    • Type
    • Legal Hold Policy
    • Assign To
  • Status - Will be set to "Success" if the request succeeds or "Error" if a failure occurs.
  • Error Message - Will be populated when the status is "Error".

Error Messages:

  • Invalid username or password/token.
  • User with the specified login already exists.
  • Invalid input parameters in request.
  • The credentials associated with the Box Spoke connection does not have enough permission to perform this action.

To use this action, the corresponding Box connection and credential must be created and associated with the Box Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
